title: Characters Font Blog
content:
This is the [Font Blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017024745/http:/www.characters.nl/blog/) from [Characters Font Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017024745/http:/www.characters.nl/). Visit the [Font Blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017024745/http:/www.characters.nl/blog/) for more information about the release, updates and usage of Characters fonts.  
Visit the [Characters Font Foundry website](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017024745/http:/www.characters.nl/) for a complete overview of all our fonts, download Sample PDF's and buy your fonts.
author: Rene Verkaart
